original_title: Former Pradeshiya Sabha member dies in Meegoda shooting
original_body_lines: (UPDATE): The former Homagama Pradeshiya Sabha member, who sustained injuries in a shooting incident in Meegoda earlier today has succumbed to his injuries while receiving treatment at the hospital.
A former Homagama Pradeshiya Sabha member has sustained injuries in a shooting incident in Meegoda, Police stated.
